title: Game Connectivity Issues as of 7.14
body: Getting an error that says "Unable to connect to the server. Please check your network connection and attempt to reconnect to your game." This was following two successful games prior to being given the error. Nothing is wrong with my network connection (and nothing has changed about it), and I've never experienced this issue in the past. Thoughts on a solution? Tried resetting the client, my computer, and my network.

replies.body: You might be hitting some kind of hiccup in your connection on its way to our servers. Even though nothing might have changed as far as you can tell, make sure you go through the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) just to be sure everything is still in order.
